snippet: A dip in the ratings for Nickelodeon and costs from a legal fight with the makers of the video game Rock Band contributed to lower earnings, and domestic advertising revenues were also down.
abstract: A dip in the ratings for Nickelodeon and costs from a legal fight with the makers of the video game Rock Band contributed to lower earnings, and domestic advertising revenues were also down.

headline.main: Slumping Nickelodeon Ratings Contribute to Lower Earnings for Viacom
